title: Portfolio Website
shortDescription: A modern, animated portfolio to showcase my work.
longDescription: A fully responsive, monochrome-themed portfolio built with Next.js 14, TypeScript, and Tailwind CSS. Features advanced animations, a chat widget, and dynamic project pages. Designed for accessibility and performance.

title: Task Tracker App
shortDescription: A productivity app for tracking daily tasks.
longDescription: A simple yet powerful task tracker built with React, TypeScript, and Tailwind CSS. Allows users to add, edit, and complete tasks with a clean, minimalist UI.
